name: SMTP for Sendinblue – YaySMTP
author: YayCommerce

sections.description:
Send emails from WordPress through Sendinblue using SMTP by YayCommerce

SMTP for Brevo, formerly Sendinblue, helps you send sleek email notifications successfully. It has an advanced email log with various options to help you show/hide columns, view/filter data, and set up auto-delete old data as well.

With a good SMTP plugin dedicated to Sendinblue, you can make sure to improve the audience engagement and deliverability of your transactional email messages.

It works great for plain text, HTML mail, promotional and marketing email.

‚ö°Ô∏è FEATURES

SMTP for Sendinblue – YaySMTP comes with a modern user interface that lets you start sending and receiving emails through WordPress quickly.

  • Simple setup: clear interface and simplified user experience
  • Email log: set log duration, show/hide columns
  • Email actions: display, search, view, delete emails easily
  • Super lightweight: no-nonsense coding
  • Single window: set up API key and make changes without reloading the page
  • Send test email: one click to send email for testing

üéè Supported Themes and Plugins

  • Complete compatibility with all themes, page builders and major plugins.
  • Perfect with YayMail – WooCommerce Email Customizer plugin.

üìù Documentation and Support

If you’re having issues, do let us know and we’ll be happy to help.

‚ô•Ô∏è Like this YaySMTP Plugin?

  • Rate us 5‚≠ê stars on WordPress.org.
  • Follow us for latest updates!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compliant with GDPR?

Absolutely! YaySMTP doesn’t collect or store any personal information. So rest assured.

Is YaySMTP free?

Yes, you can use it free of charge. YayCommerce WP SMTP plugin for Sendinblue comes with all features that you can find in the description above.

I want to switch from Brevo, what should I do?

You can install our YaySMTP primary plugin. It comes with 15+ SMTP email services and allows you to export/import email logs.

How can I further customize my emails?

You can customize WooCommerce email templates by using YayMail free plugin. Fully compatible and optimized for WooCommerce.
